message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you this product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details, I can assure you it's worth at least $1 million to the right person. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000, which is a fair price considering its potential value to you.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss it further.
